item.title: Australian Government Releases Response on Digital Currency & FinTech Regulations
item.description:
Australian Government Releases Response on Digital Currency & FinTech Regulations

The Australian Government has released a 5-page report detailing its response to the recommendations made by the Australian Senate Economics References Committee last year, which called for all digital currency exchanges within the country to be brought under existing anti-money laundering (AML) and counter-terrorist finance (CTF) regulations.

item.title: A Discussion With Antiwar.com's Angela Keaton - Bitcoin News
item.description:
A Discussion With Antiwar.com's Angela Keaton - Bitcoin News

Antiwar.com Also read: 'Life On Bitcoin' is Easier Than Producing a Film About it is ran by a dedicated group of activists devoted to non-interventionism and opposed to the military-industrial complex. The site was founded in 1995 and has been spreading the idea of peace ever since.

item.title: Kraken Enables Ethereum Dark Pool Trading
item.description:
Kraken Enables Ethereum Dark Pool Trading

The Kraken exchange remains one of the most popular platforms to trade cryptocurrency in a convenient manner. Not too long ago, the company added Ethereum trading. And as of today, they also offer an Ethereum Dark Pool for traders. It is not the first time opens a so-called Dark Pool for high-volume traders who prefer anonymity when buying and selling cryptocurrency.

item.title: No More Malicious Financial Ads On Google Come July
item.description:
No More Malicious Financial Ads On Google Come July

Exciting changes are abound for Google users all over the world, as the company is finally cracking down on misleading financial advertisements. Come July 2016; the search engine will vet commercial ads to protect users from deceptive products and services.

item.title: Dragon's Tale - Play Eight Treasures and Win Bitcoin - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Dragon's Tale - Play Eight Treasures and Win Bitcoin - NEWSBTC

Dragon's Tale is an original online Bitcoin Casino that brings a new style into play. It has mixed gambling with role playing to ultimately result a magnificent and unique game for the Bitcoin ecosystem. In the virtual world of Dragon's Tale, players are able to find fun-filled casino based mini-games, offering attractive Bitcoin rewards to the winners.

item.title: Why Silvergate's CEO is Banking 15 Bitcoin Companies - CoinDesk
item.description:
Why Silvergate's CEO is Banking 15 Bitcoin Companies - CoinDesk

Startups focused on products and services based on bitcoin have never had an easy time opening bank accounts - or maintaining positive relationships with those firms. The problem? Bitcoin-related clients are frequently viewed as high-risk by banking institutions, and thus far few banks have shown an interest in going through the process of mitigating that risk.

item.title: Nobuaki Kobayashi Decides Against Making Mt Gox Bitcoin Addresses Public - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Nobuaki Kobayashi Decides Against Making Mt Gox Bitcoin Addresses Public - NEWSBTC

The wallet addresses belonging to Mt Gox will not be made public, said the court-appointed trustee in today's statement. Read more... If there is one incident which the bitcoin community is forced to revisit occasionally, then Mt Gox takes the cake.

item.title: Proposed Hard-Fork to Nullify ASICBoost Patent - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Proposed Hard-Fork to Nullify ASICBoost Patent - Bitcoinist.net

Bitcoin Core contributor, Peter Todd, announced that a hard-fork had been proposed to negate attempts to patent the Also read: Kraken Launches ETH Dark Pool Trading ASICBoost method. According to a message by Peter, this proposed idea sprang from an agreement made at a Bitcoin-oriented round-table in February.

item.title: Bitcoin.com Partner With SoftSwiss to Launch Digital Currency Casino
item.description:
Bitcoin.com Partner With SoftSwiss to Launch Digital Currency Casino

SoftSwiss, a white label online casino platform developer, announced today a white label partnership with Bitcoin.com, currently owned by famed Bitcoin investor Roger Ver. Ver was involved in the early-stage funding of several prominent digital currency firms such as Kraken, Bockchcain.info and BitPay.
